Title: Go to the countryside, go to the border areas, go to the places where the motherland needs you the most
Notes: The train has departed from Shanghai (上海).The text in the image reads:It is absolutely necessary for the educated youth to go to the countryside to receive re-education from the Poor and Lower-Middle peasants (知识青年到农村去，接受贫下中农的再教育，很有必要)The slogan on the train reads:Always learn from comrade Jin Xunhua (向金训华同志学习)
Theme: Up to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)
